### Dataset Information

- The dataset comes from the Faisalabad Institute of Cardiology and the Allied Hospital in Faisalabad Pakistan and consists of the medical records of 299 patients who experienced heart failure [@chicco2020machine].
- There are 299 patient records with 13 features per record.
- We use this dataset to create and evaluate a Random Forest model used for predicting heart failure events for patients.
